clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy of Zn Biofortified Wheat in Improving Zn Status in Indian School Children With Low Zn Status
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy of Zn Biofortified Wheat in Improving Zn Status in Indian School Children With Low Zn Status: a Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this research is to test the efficacy of Zn biofortified wheat in increasing Zn status in Indian school children aged 6-12 y via a 6 month randomized controlled trial.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Change of plasma zinc values from baseline to endpoint and two months post intervention
primary_outcome.time_frame: day 0, random between day 0 and 6 month, 6 month and random between 6 months and 2 months post-intervention
primary_outcome.description: plasma zinc will be measured at baseline, midpoint (random sparse sampling), endpoint (6 months) and randomly within two months post-intervention

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in the Inflammation marker from baseline to the end of the intervention, as well as post-intervention
secondary_outcome.time_frame: day 0, random during the intervention, month 6, and random 2 months post intervention
secondary_outcome.description: CRP will be measured at baseline, midpoint (random sparse sampling), endpoint (end of intervention) and randomly within two months post-intervention

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in the chronic inflammation marker from baseline to 6 months and 2 month post intervention
secondary_outcome.time_frame: day 0, random during the intervention, month 6, and random 2 months post intervention
secondary_outcome.description: AGP will be measured at baseline, midpoint (random sparse sampling), endpoint (6 months)and randomly within two months post-intervention

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Iron status from baseline to the end of the intervention and 2 months post-intervention
secondary_outcome.time_frame: day 0, random during the intervention, month 6, and random 2 months post intervention
secondary_outcome.description: Hb will be measured at baseline, midpoint (random sparse sampling), endpoint (6 months) and randomly within two months post-intervention

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Iron status from baseline to the end of intervention, and within two months post-intervention
secondary_outcome.time_frame: day 0, random during the intervention, month 6, and random 2 months post intervention
secondary_outcome.description: Serum ferritin will be measured at baseline, midpoint (random sparse sampling), endpoint and randomly within two months post-intervention

secondary_outcome.time_frame: day 0, random during the intervention, month 6, and random 2 months post intervention
secondary_outcome.description: new potential zn biomarkers will be measured in whole blood and plasma at baseline, midpoint (random sparse sampling), endpoint and randomly within two months post-intervention

secondary_outcome.measure: New potential Zn biomarkers in buccal cells
secondary_outcome.time_frame: day 0, random during the intervention, month 6, and random 2 months post intervention
secondary_outcome.description: MT RNA transcript in buccal cells will be measured at baseline, midpoint (random sparse sampling), endpoint
Characterization of microflora will be done in a subsamples of children (taken randomly), at baseline and at the end of feeding (6 months)
anthropometry, such as height, weight will be measured at baseline and endpoint of the study
morbidity, mainly diarrhea and pneumonia episodes, will be recorded throughout the study

arm_group.description: Control wheat used for meal, level of zinc is usual
Fortification Wheat is fortified before testmeal administration. Zinc level is comparable to WHO recommendation
Biofortification Biofortified wheat is used for testmeal administration. Zinc concentration is around 30% higher than control

intervention.description: Wheat was grown by foliar Zn application and is therefore biofortified
Wheat flour is fortified before testmeal preparation
wheat flour is used as control comparator.
